name: Table Game Spirits V
description:
Table Game Spirits 2 is a collection of 16 classic games. They can be categorized as:
Tile games:
  • Mahjong
  • Nikakudori
  • Futari Uchi Mahjong
    • Action Games
  • Block Kuzushi
    • Puzzle Games
  • Slide Puzzle
    • Board Games
  • Shogi
  • Reversi
  • Chess
    • Card Games:
  • Koi-Koi
  • Speed
  • Solitaire
  • Daifug?
  • 7-Narabe
  • Speed 7-Narabe
    • Sports Games
  • Darts
  • Air Hockey
gamePlay: Board game, Cards / tiles, Chess, Paddle / Pong
